data.message:
I'm just here to bitch and moan because you talked shit about a sitting president... again...

Just kidding, I just came to watch the trolls complain some more.  Whiny bitches.  #I-Stan-With-Em

replies.message: Holy shit I think we have today's winner

I find it funny that the people who are pissed, mad, upset and or butt hurt over what Eminem said on his freestyle and yet they are here on his page? Just because I disagree with somebody doesn't mean that I'm not going to listen to their music, because somebody disagrees with me doesn't mean that they don't have to like me. I love Eminem's music and will always, always listen to his music regardless of what he says. That has got me through some really tough times in my life and I hold it dear to my heart. Remember you're free to not like somebody if you wish but because someone tells you to fuck off doesn't mean you got to stalk their page and bitch in moan on their posts. That's part of the problem in America. I will always support Eminem's music regardless if he agrees disagrees or has a totally different take on politics than I do..
Oh my.  The musical/political expert has arrived and proved that he's just another whiny bitch.  Thanks for stopping by.
Anti Trumper posts stuff for the sole purpose of eliciting a response and when he receives said response, he complains.Liberals at work.
Thanks vigilant internet psychologist.  I could have gone without response but I definitely expected some form of response coming out of the thinned skinned population.
This is great. Eloy Cano you are the shit. Lol
Came to watch trolls, but trolled at first, then apologized for it.  You are a fucking genius.
I`m willing to bet the woman on your pic has a bigger clit, then you have a cock, LOL !!!
When you try to make a whimsical retort, make it a classic . . .
